name: DOI
description: A unique DOI is given for each manuscript

name: unique
description: The combination of DOI, Sample_ID, and Subsample_ID is unique for each row

name: Sample_ID
description: A unique sample ID is given for each sample

name: Subsample_ID
description: A unique subsample ID is given is subsample is applicable

name: Location
description: Location of bottled or tap water to highest specificity, if applicaple

name: Approximate_Lattitude
description: Approximate lattitude of location provided and is greater than -90 and less than 90

name: Approximate_Longitude
description: Approximate longitude of location provided and is greater than -180 and less than 180

name: Source
description: Source of water, either bottled water or tap water

name: Date
description: Date sample was collected, if applicable

name: Concentration
description: Concentration of particles in sample (number or range) without units

name: Concentration_Units
description: Units corresponding to concentration value

name: Color_Transparent
